languages.text: "Кхе мпра'кс вндрт'кд". {n}Длинный змееподобный язык выбирается из пасти существа и слизывает собственную кровь, смакуя ее, словно вино. Рана от выстрела на ваших глазах затягивается, словно ее никогда и не было.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кхе мпра'кс вндрт'кд". {n}Длинный змееподобный язык выбирается из пасти существа и слизывает собственную кровь, смакуя ее, словно вино. Рана от выстрела на ваших глазах затягивается, словно ее никогда и не было.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кхе мпра'кс вндрт'кд". {n}Длинный змееподобный язык выбирается из пасти существа и слизывает собственную кровь, смакуя ее, словно вино. Рана от выстрела на ваших глазах затягивается, словно ее никогда и не было.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: 「ケ・プラクス・ヴンドゥクト」{n}生き物の口から長い蛇のような舌が現れ、自分の血を舐めとってワインのように味わう。先ほど撃ちこんだ弾の損傷が目の前でみるみると癒えていき、綺麗になくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ケ・プラクス・ヴンドゥクト」{n}生き物の口から長い蛇のような舌が現れ、自分の血を舐めとってワインのように味わう。先ほど撃ちこんだ弾の損傷が目の前でみるみると癒えていき、綺麗になくなった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: «Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd». {n}Una lengua larga y serpentina surge de la boca de la criatura y lame su propia sangre, degustándola como si fuera vino. La herida de tu disparo se cierra ante tus ojos como si nunca hubiera existido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd». {n}Una lengua larga y serpentina surge de la boca de la criatura y lame su propia sangre, degustándola como si fuera vino. La herida de tu disparo se cierra ante tus ojos como si nunca hubiera existido.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: “Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd。”{n}怪物探出蛇信般的长舌，舔了舔自己的血，仿佛在品尝某种佳酿。子弹造成的伤口在你的眼前渐渐愈合，完好如初。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd。”{n}怪物探出蛇信般的长舌，舔了舔自己的血，仿佛在品尝某种佳酿。子弹造成的伤口在你的眼前渐渐愈合，完好如初。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: « Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd. » {n}Une longue langue rappelant celle d'un serpent surgit de la bouche de la créature et entreprend de lécher son propre sang avec délice. La blessure infligée par le projectile commence à cicatriser sous vos yeux, avant de disparaître totalement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd. » {n}Une longue langue rappelant celle d'un serpent surgit de la bouche de la créature et entreprend de lécher son propre sang avec délice. La blessure infligée par le projectile commence à cicatriser sous vos yeux, avant de disparaître totalement.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}Eine lange, schlangenähnliche Zunge kriecht aus dem Mund der Kreatur und leckt sich das eigene Blut ab, kostet es genießerisch wie einen guten Wein. Die Schusswunde verheilt vor deinen Augen, als sei sie nie dagewesen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}Eine lange, schlangenähnliche Zunge kriecht aus dem Mund der Kreatur und leckt sich das eigene Blut ab, kostet es genießerisch wie einen guten Wein. Die Schusswunde verheilt vor deinen Augen, als sei sie nie dagewesen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}Yaratığın ağzından uzun, yılanı andıran bir dil çıkıp şarap misali tadını çıkara çıkara kendi kanını içiyor. Kurşun yarası, sanki hiç var olmamış gibi gözlerinin önünde iyileşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Khe mpra'ks vndrt'kd." {n}A long, snake-like tongue emerges from the creature's mouth and licks its own blood, savouring it like wine. The wound from the shot heals before your very eyes, as if it was never there.{/n}
